mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART(USER_CODE, PRODUCT_CODE, ORDER_QUANTITY, CART_CODE) SELECT #{user_code}, #{product_code}, #{order_quantity}, IFNULL( (SELECT CART_CODE FROM CART WHERE USER_CODE = #{user_code} LIMIT 1), fnCode('cart') );
mapper.select: SELECT F.PRODUCT_NAME, F.PRODUCT_PRICE, C.ORDER_QUANTITY, C.USER_CODE, C.CART_CODE, F.PRODUCT_CODE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY C.CART_CODE) AS SEQUENCE_NUMBER FROM CART C JOIN FOOD F ON C.PRODUCT_CODE = F.PRODUCT_CODE WHERE C.USER_CODE = #{user_code} ORDER BY C.CART_CODE;
